channel.title: D/c's when you die?
channel.description: I've gone through everything when you die and used "sendMessage" 's as tests to see which ones were being called when you died. Only one was and there was no kick or anything. The only thing it does is the animation. Can someone please tell me how to stop the server from kicking you when you die.

item.title: D/c's when you die?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

It’s in your applyDead method.

Read full topic

item.title: D/c's when you die?

item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Ummm You could search for either “dead” or “die” Maybe “when dead” or “when die” or something like that.

item.description:

item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

so, when you die, The server kicks you? Well that may be either part of Playerhandler.java or Client.Java, Search for “Kick” Or something in either of those files.
